description: Try our easy to follow Papaya, Raspberry & Grapefruit Juice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Papaya, Raspberry & Grapefruit Juice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lime, 1/2 juice only and 1/2 sliced (slices to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop out the flesh of the papaya. Segment the grapefruit, leaving the pith on, and juice it with the papaya and raspberries and lime juice.
Pour into a glass, add the ice cubes, if using, and decorate with lime slices if liked.
